    • Method Detail

      • getInetSocketAddress

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress getInetSocketAddress()
        Gets the remote connection details of this peer
        Returns:
        the InetSocketAddress containing remote host address and port

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose this RmiHandler and frees all the used resources and threads. A call to this method cause a callback on the failure observers attached to the RmiRegistry associated to this instance sending them an instance of RemoteException

      • isDisposed

        public boolean isDisposed()
        Gets the disposed status of this peer
        Returns:
        true if this peer has been disposed, false otherwise
